hero.title: Unified Account
hero.description: Fast and secure authorization for all your services. Manage data, payments and family access in one place.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your account

feature1.title: Security
feature1.description: Data protection according to GOST standard

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to popular questions
faq.a1: Loginus ID is a unified account for all Loginus services.
faq.a2: Click the 'Login' button and follow the instructions.
faq.q3: Is it safe to store data?
faq.a3: Yes, we use encryption according to GOST standard.
